statements: UPSERT INTO education_data (id, student_name, age, grade) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 10, 'A')
UPSERT INTO education_data (id, student_name, age, grade) VALUES (2, 'Bob', 11, 'B')
UPSERT INTO education_data (id, student_name, age, grade) VALUES (3, 'Charlie', 12, 'C')
UPSERT INTO students (student_id, student_name, grade_level) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 10);
UPSERT INTO courses (course_id, course_name, credit_hours, teacher_id) VALUES (101, 'Mathematics', 3, 201);
UPSERT INTO students (student_id, student_name, grade_level) VALUES (2, 'Bob', 11);
UPSERT INTO Courses (course_id, course_name, instructor_name) VALUES (1, 'Mathematics', 'John Doe')
UPSERT INTO Students (student_id, student_name, course_id) VALUES (101, 'Alice', 1)
UPSERT INTO Enrollments (enrollment_id, student_id, course_id) VALUES (501, 101, 1)
INSERT INTO students (student_id, student_name, student_grade) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 95) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE student_name='Alice', student_grade=95
INSERT INTO courses (course_id, course_name, instructor_name) VALUES (101, 'Mathematics', 'Mr. Smith') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE course_name='Mathematics', instructor_name='Mr. Smith'
INSERT INTO enrollments (enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date) VALUES (201, 1, 101, '2022-12-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE enrollment_date='2022-12-01'
INSERT INTO students (id, name, age, grade) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 18, 'A') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='Alice', age=18, grade='A'
INSERT INTO teachers (id, name, subject, experience) VALUES (1, 'Mr. Smith', 'Math', 5) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='Mr. Smith', subject='Math', experience=5
INSERT INTO enrollments (enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date) VALUES (1, 1, 1, '2022-01-15') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE student_id=1, course_id=1, enrollment_date='2022-01-15'
